016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.binarytree.neo4j;
017
018import no.cantara.binarytree.Node;
019import org.neo4j.graphdb.Direction;
020import org.neo4j.graphdb.Relationship;
021import org.neo4j.graphdb.RelationshipType;
022import org.neo4j.graphdb.ResourceIterable;
023
024import java.util.Map;
025import java.util.Objects;
026import java.util.Set;
027
028public class Neo4jNode implements Node {
029
030    public static final String RELATION_LEFT = "LEFT";
031    public static final String RELATION_RIGHT = "RIGHT";
032    public static final String RELATION_PARENT = "PARENT";
033    public static final String DATA_PROPERTY_KEY = "_key";
034    public static final String PROPERTY_KEY_COLOR = "_color";
035    public static final String PROPERTY_KEY_HEIGHT = "_height";
036
037    public static final Set<String> NAVIGABLE_RELATIONS_SET = Set.of(RELATION_LEFT, RELATION_RIGHT, RELATION_PARENT);
038    public static final Set<String> NAVIGABLE_PROPERTIES_SET = Set.of(DATA_PROPERTY_KEY, PROPERTY_KEY_COLOR, PROPERTY_KEY_HEIGHT);
039
040    private static final RelationshipType RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_LEFT = RelationshipType.withName(RELATION_LEFT);
041    private static final RelationshipType RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_RIGHT = RelationshipType.withName(RELATION_RIGHT);
042    private static final RelationshipType RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_PARENT = RelationshipType.withName(RELATION_PARENT);
043
044    private final org.neo4j.graphdb.Node neo4jNode;
045
046    public Neo4jNode(org.neo4j.graphdb.Node neo4jNode) {
047        this.neo4jNode = neo4jNode;
048    }
049
050    public org.neo4j.graphdb.Node neo4jNode() {
051        return neo4jNode;
052    }
053
054    @Override
055    public long data() {
056        return (Long) neo4jNode.getProperty(DATA_PROPERTY_KEY);
057    }
058
059    @Override
060    public Neo4jNode data(long data) {
061        neo4jNode.setProperty(DATA_PROPERTY_KEY, data);
062        return this;
063    }
064
065    @Override
066    public Neo4jNode left() {
067        Relationship left = neo4jNode.getSingleRelationship(RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_LEFT, Direction.OUTGOING);
068        if (left == null) {
069            return null;
070        }
071        org.neo4j.graphdb.Node leftNode = left.getEndNode();
072        return new Neo4jNode(leftNode);
073    }
074
075    @Override
076    public Neo4jNode left(Node left) {
077        Relationship existingRelationship = neo4jNode.getSingleRelationship(RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_LEFT, Direction.OUTGOING);
078        if (existingRelationship != null) {
079            existingRelationship.delete();
080        }
081        if (left == null) {
082            return this;
083        }
084        Neo4jNode leftNeo4j = (Neo4jNode) left;
085        neo4jNode.createRelationshipTo(leftNeo4j.neo4jNode, RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_LEFT);
086        return this;
087    }
088
089    @Override
090    public Neo4jNode right() {
091        Relationship right = neo4jNode.getSingleRelationship(RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_RIGHT, Direction.OUTGOING);
092        if (right == null) {
093            return null;
094        }
095        org.neo4j.graphdb.Node rightNode = right.getEndNode();
096        return new Neo4jNode(rightNode);
097    }
098
099    @Override
100    public Neo4jNode right(Node right) {
101        Relationship existingRelationship = neo4jNode.getSingleRelationship(RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_RIGHT, Direction.OUTGOING);
102        if (existingRelationship != null) {
103            existingRelationship.delete();
104        }
105        if (right == null) {
106            return this;
107        }
108        Neo4jNode rightNeo4j = (Neo4jNode) right;
109        neo4jNode.createRelationshipTo(rightNeo4j.neo4jNode, RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_RIGHT);
110        return this;
111    }
112
113    @Override
114    public Neo4jNode parent() {
115        Relationship parentRelationship = neo4jNode.getSingleRelationship(RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_PARENT, Direction.OUTGOING);
116        if (parentRelationship == null) {
117            return null;
118        }
119        return new Neo4jNode(parentRelationship.getEndNode());
120    }
121
122    @Override
123    public Neo4jNode parent(Node parent) {
124        Relationship existingParentRelationship = neo4jNode.getSingleRelationship(RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_PARENT, Direction.OUTGOING);
125        if (existingParentRelationship != null) {
126            existingParentRelationship.delete();
127        }
128        if (parent == null) {
129            return this;
130        }
131        neo4jNode.createRelationshipTo(((Neo4jNode) parent).neo4jNode, RELATIONSHIP_TYPE_PARENT);
132        return this;
133    }
134
135    @Override
136    public int height() {
137        return (Integer) neo4jNode.getProperty(PROPERTY_KEY_HEIGHT);
138    }
139
140    @Override
141    public Neo4jNode height(int height) {
142        neo4jNode.setProperty(PROPERTY_KEY_HEIGHT, height);
143        return this;
144    }
145
146    @Override
147    public boolean color() {
148        return (Boolean) neo4jNode.getProperty(PROPERTY_KEY_COLOR);
149    }
150
151    @Override
152    public Neo4jNode color(boolean color) {
153        neo4jNode.setProperty(PROPERTY_KEY_COLOR, color);
154        return this;
155    }
156
157    @Override
158    public boolean isNil() {
159        return false;
160    }
161
162    @Override
163    public void delete() {
164        try (ResourceIterable<Relationship> relationships = neo4jNode.getRelationships()) {
165            for (Relationship relationship : relationships) {
166                relationship.delete();
167            }
168        }
169        neo4jNode.delete();
170    }
171
172    @Override
173    public void copyNonNavigableStateFrom(Node _source) {
174        Neo4jNode source = (Neo4jNode) _source;
175        org.neo4j.graphdb.Node sourceNode = source.neo4jNode;
176        // copy all outgoing relationships (except tree-navigation)
177        try (ResourceIterable<Relationship> relationships = sourceNode.getRelationships(Direction.OUTGOING)) {
178            for (Relationship relationship : relationships) {
179                if (!NAVIGABLE_RELATIONS_SET.contains(relationship.getType().name())) {
180                    neo4jNode.createRelationshipTo(relationship.getEndNode(), relationship.getType());
181                }
182            }
183        }
184        // copy all incoming relationships (except tree-navigation)
185        try (ResourceIterable<Relationship> relationships = sourceNode.getRelationships(Direction.INCOMING)) {
186            for (Relationship relationship : relationships) {
187                if (!NAVIGABLE_RELATIONS_SET.contains(relationship.getType().name())) {
188                    relationship.getStartNode().createRelationshipTo(neo4jNode, relationship.getType());
189                }
190            }
191        }
192        // copy all properties (except tree-navigation)
193        for (Map.Entry<String, Object> entry : sourceNode.getAllProperties().entrySet()) {
194            if (!NAVIGABLE_PROPERTIES_SET.contains(entry.getKey())) {
195                neo4jNode.setProperty(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
196            }
197        }
198    }
199
200    @Override
201    public boolean equals(Object o) {
202        if (this == o) return true;
203        if (!(o instanceof Neo4jNode neo4jNode1)) return false;
204
205        return Objects.equals(neo4jNode, neo4jNode1.neo4jNode);
206    }
207
208    @Override
209    public int hashCode() {
210        return neo4jNode != null ? neo4jNode.hashCode() : 0;
211    }
212
213    @Override
214    public String toString() {
215        return "Neo4jNodeId=" + neo4jNode.getElementId();
216    }
217}
